title: 1058 - Forgotten Bakes | Great British Bake You Off to Sleep C5/S8 E8
description:
Scooter checks in with his internal Nana, loses his butterscotch rights, but the bakers make it all syrupy sweet.

Stay up to date with all of our FUN Fundraising and Awareness-raising live streams and other cool stuff by signing up for our free newsletter at www.sleepwithmepodcast.com/badmagic
The Midnight Mission - a comprehensive homeless shelter and homeless services provider offering the structure and the resources that people experiencing homelessness need to truly improve their lives. www.midnightmission.org

Support our AAPI community- www.napawf.org/take-action

Black Lives Matter. More resources here- https://linktr.ee/dearestscooter. Here is a list of Anti-racism resources- http://bit.ly/ANTIRACISMRESOURCES

Here is one place you can find support https://www.crisistextline.org/ There are more global helplines here https://linktr.ee/creatorselfcare

Become a patron https://www.patreon.com/sleepwithme

Athletic Greens- With ONE, delicious scoop of AG1, you’re absorbing 75 high-quality vitamins, minerals, whole-food sourced superfoods, probiotics, and adaptogens to help you start your day right. Athletic Greens is going to give you a FREE 1 year supply of immune-supporting Vitamin D AND 5 FREE travel packs with your first purchase at athleticgreens.com/sleep!

Bank Novo- Instead of a one-size-fits-all approach, Novo is customized to your business - to save you time and free up cash flow - with seamless integrations to Stripe, Shopify, Quickbooks Online, and more. Sign up for Novo for FREE at novo.com/sleep and join the community of over 150,000 fearless small businesses who’ve found the customizable business checking solution that admires their brave at novo.co/sleep

Headspace- Go to https://www.headspace.com/sleepwithme and use sleepwithme for a FREE one-month trial!!

LinkedIn - When your business is ready to make that next hire, find the right person with LinkedIn Jobs. And now, you can post a job for free. Just visit LinkedIn.com/SLEEP. Terms and conditions apply.

Air Doctor- Just go to https://www.airdoctorpro.com/ and use promo code SLEEP and you’ll receive a 35% discount.

Betterhelp- our listeners get 10% off your first month with discount code “sleepwithme”. Go over to www.betterhelp.com/sleepwithme and simply fill out a questionnaire.

Audible- Try Audible for (30) days on us. Visit audible.com/sleepwithme or text sleepwithme to 500-500.

Caviar- is the food delivery app for people that are passionate about food. Caviar is offering 50% off two orders up to $20 value per order, put in the offer code SLEEP at checkout.

Progressive- Sleep with Me is brought to you by Progressive. Get your quote today at Progressive.com and see why 4 out of 5 new auto customers recommend Progressive. Progressive Casualty Insurance Company and affiliates. Price and coverage match limited by state law.
